instructions: Tap Menu (either a hard or soft button). Select Settings > Applications > Manage applications. Tap the app you want to delete. Tap Uninstall to remove the app from your device. If there's no uninstall button, it's a system app, and you can't delete it.
Tap the Recent apps button followed by Task manager. Go to the Download tab and find the offending app. Tap the Uninstall button next to the app. Tap OK .

Go to the Home screen and tap on the Apps tab. Tap the Device tab to show only the apps on your Kindle as opposed to all the apps you could potentially store on your Kindle. Long-press on the app you want to remove until you feel or see a response. Tap Remove from Device .
